ASU.F.summary: AS LHV Group, through its subsidiaries, provides banking, security brokerage, financial advisory, finance lease, and other lending services to private and business clients in Estonia. It operates through three segments: Retail Banking, Financial Intermediates, and Corporate Banking. The company offers demand and fixed-term deposits and accounts; home and private, consumer, car, home repair, furnishing, health and beauty, student, micro, working capital, investment, and margin loans; and financing the acquisition of a company, overdrafts, leasing, hire-purchase, guarantees, letters of credit, documentary collection, warehouse financing, and factoring. It also provides institutional brokerage, pension, investment fund, and payment and investment services; banking cards; and investment advice, as well as mobile banking and ATM services. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Tallinn, Estonia.

CPA1T.TL.summary: Coop Pank AS, together with its subsidiaries, provides banking and financing solutions to private and business clients in Estonia. It operates through Corporate Banking, Retail Banking, Consumer Financing, Leasing, and Other segments. The company provides banking plans; term, saving, children, and operating deposits; small, car, home renovation, travel, home, refinancing, mortgage, working capital, investment, seasonal work, and apartment association loans; and payment, overdraft, transfer, guarantee, and leasing services, as well as debit, credit, and loyalty cards. It also provides Internet and mobile banking services, as well as motor, comprehensive, travel, and home insurance services. The company was formerly known as AS Eesti Krediidipank. Coop Pank AS was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Tallinn, the Republic of Estonia.
